name: The Burst
summary:
GO WILD

An exciting combination of explosive parkour movement, grappling hook, vehicles and flesh-rending weapons will let you go absolutely crazy. Let your creativity run wild!

MAKE THIS WORLD BURST

Armory: More than ten different weapons to assist you in your mission. Carry them behind your back or swap them on the fly with the help of your grappling hook!
